channel.title: Website of Jane Doe
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Jane Doe

item.title: Project 3
item.description: Link Click Here to access Github of the code. Learning Objectives Continue practice working with multiple input files Use relative filename paths instead of absolute filenames Implement a sorted tree such as a Binary Search Tree in Java Perform traversal operation on binary search tree If you choose Java, a review of Java concepts such as Creating classes, and instantiating them Creating a node class to be re-used in a linked list class If you choose another language, getting acquainted enough to work with tree data structure Problem Description A local Radio DJ wants to create a sorted playlist based on the song title name.

item.title: Project 2
item.description: Link Click Here to access Github of the code. Learning Objectives Continue practice putting together a small project with input file and output file If you choose Java, a review of Java concepts Creating classes, and instantiating them Creating a node class to be re-used in a linked list class If you choose another language, getting acquainted enough to work with linked list data structure Problem Description A record label executive received text files that contain the top streamed music artists during certain weeks.

item.title: Project 1
item.description: Link Click Here to access Github of the code. Learning Objectives Putting together a small project with input file and output file If you choose Java, a review of Java concepts Java array type, and 2D arrays Creating classes, and instantiating them If you choose another language, getting acquainted enough to produce the report Problem Description A record label executive received text files that contain the top streamed music artists during certain weeks.
